table:table-cell.text:p: Welcome {USERNAME}!\n\nThis channel features an *interactive guessing game*. For help on how to play, click the “?” button near your icon in the upper left.
¡Bienvenido {USERNAME}!\n\nEste canal presenta un *juego interactivo de adivinanzas*. Para obtener ayuda sobre cómo jugar, haga clic en el botón "?" Cerca de su icono en la parte superior izquierda.
Welcome {USERNAME}!\n\nThis channel features an *interactive guessing game*. For help on how to play, use the "?" near your icon in the upper left or press the menu button on your controller.

¡Bienvenido {USERNAME}!\n\nEste canal presenta un *juego interactivo de adivinanzas*. Para obtener ayuda sobre cómo jugar, utilice el "?" cerca de su ícono en la parte superior izquierda o presione el botón de menú en su controlador.
Welcome {USERNAME}!\n\nThis channel features an *interactive guessing game*. For help on how to play, click the “?” above.
¡Bienvenido {USERNAME}!\n\nEste canal presenta un *juego interactivo de adivinanzas*. Para obtener ayuda sobre cómo jugar, haga clic en "?" arriba.
Make *guesses* on offers appearing to the left by moving your mouse over them and selecting ~Yes~ or |No|.
Realice *adivinanzas* sobre las ofertas que aparecen a la izquierda moviendo el mouse sobre ellas y seleccionando ~Sí~ o |No|.
Make *guesses* on offers appearing to the left by tapping on them and selecting ~Yes~ or |No|.
Realice *adivinanzas* sobre las ofertas que aparecen a la izquierda al tocarlas y seleccionando ~Sí~ o |No|.

Make *guesses* on offers appearing to the left and navigating them with the left stick or directional pad on your controller, opening offer panel by pressing the A Button, and pressing the buttons shown for ~Yes~ or |No|.

Realice *adivinanzas* sobre las ofertas que aparecen a la izquierda y navegue por ellas con la palanca izquierda o el control direccional del controlador, abra el panel de ofertas presionando el botón A y presione los botones que se muestran para ~Sí~ o |No|.
You'll *win* τ{CREDITS}τ for correct guesses, but any τ{CREDITS}τ used on an incorrect guess are *lost*.
*Ganarás* τ{CREDITS}τ por acertadas adivinanzas, pero cualquier τ{CREDITS}τ usada en una suposición incorrecta *se perderá*.
You can *change* the number of τ{CREDITS}τ you want to guess with by using the selector to the left of the guessing buttons.
Puede *cambiar* la cantidad de τ{CREDITS}τ que desea adivinar usando el selector a la izquierda de los botones de adivinación.
Be sure to make your guesses before the offers *lock*!
¡Asegúrate de hacer tus adivinanzas antes de que las ofertas *se bloqueen*!
Winnings equal the amount you guessed times the *multiplier* shown on the right when viewing the offer.
Las ganancias equivalen a la cantidad que adivinaste el *multiplicador* que se muestra a la derecha al ver la oferta.
τ{CREDITS}τ counts are *reset* at the beginning of each round.
Los recuentos de τ{CREDITS}τ *se reinician* al comienzo de cada ronda.
Offer is locked:\nNo guesses can be made
La oferta está bloqueada:\nNo se puede hacer adivinanzas
Offer is being resolved:\nNo guesses can be made
La oferta se está resolviendo:\nNo se puede hacer adivinanzas
El ganador de la ronda es...
Are you sure you want to exit Mixguess?
¿Estás seguro de que quieres salir de Mixguess?
Activar / Desactivar los Anotes de Acciones
AUTOFEED IS WAITING FOR A NEW MATCH...
Guess arrived too close to event!
Toggle the visibility of individual UI elements
Send a chat message at the beginning of each round
Send a chat message at the end of each round and call out the round winners in chat
Post a message in chat for each new offer
Post a message in chat every time an offer is resolved. Include the reason for the resolution, if one is given
Every once in a while, explain MixGuess in chat
Change the position of certain UI elements
Change settings for MixGuess interaction with your channel currency
Give channel currency to the winner of each round via a chat bot command
Send the award command as a whisper instead of a general chat message
When whisper is on, the command will be whispered to this user. This field is ignored when whisper is off.
The command your channel bot uses to add currency to a user
How much of your channel currency you want to give the winner
Require a mod to okay handing out channel currency
This player used a MixGuess spark button in a round they won
This player used a MixGuess spark button this round
Show or hide the buttons players use to spend sparks
All spark buttons have been disabled
Spark buttons are not available to anonymous players.\n\nPlease sign in to use the spark buttons.
The label appearing on the button
Text for a tooltip for the button
How many sparks this button costs to activate
Any Unicode character pasted here will appear in the leaderboards next to the name of the user who presses this button
The chat bot will send this message when the button is pressed
Assign and adjust an extra button command
Customize the buttons player can use to give sparks
WAITING FOR MOD TO START ROUND
When whisper is on, the command will be whispered to this user. This field is ignored when whisper is off.
This is the user the chat bot will whisper the command to if 'Whisper Button Command' is on
How many times the button must be pressed before the command is fired
How long to wait between button presses before resetting the press required press count. A time of 0 means don't reset

A message sent by the chat bot when the button is triggered

Multiple commands can be set by dividing them with semicolons like this: “command 1;command 2”

Keywords can be used in commands as [keyword] or $keyword.

Button Command Keywords:
player: the user who pressed the button
sparks: the spark cost of the pressed button
icon: the button icon (if any)
presscount: the number of times the button has been pressed before the command activates (the chat message will fire every time the button is pressed)
needcount: the number of times the button must be pressed before the command is fired
Customize the cooldown settings on the button
All buttons with group cooldown set to “On” will cooldown when any of them are pressed
The number of seconds this button cools down for all users after being pressed
How many seconds all buttons participating in “cooldown with group” will be on cooldown after one of them is activated. Changing the value here will change it for all buttons in the group
The number of seconds this button cools down for JUST the user who pressed the button
Show or hide this button in the UI. If hidden it will not take up any space in the layout
View information about how well the automated system is seeing the game on your channel
Supply an reason to display for the refund
Turn the spark spend effects for this button on or off
The number of seconds the button command string is delayed after being triggered
Show or hide the game UI for remote players
Allow the game client to locally save things such as leaderboards, mod permissions, and user settings
Show or hide the UI for manually awarding {CREDITS} to all players in the game
Show or hide the the mod only controls
Show or hide the UI for starting and ending rounds
Show or hide the stats display for MixGuess
Show or hide the location where the effect starts when “Give {CREDITS}” is used
Allow or disallow MixGuess to automatically manage offers for supported games
Non-mod players can't see MixGuess while the UI is hidden. When you want them to see the UI go to the settings menu and toggle "Participant UI" on.
Opens a web page so you can give us feedback about MixGuess
An icon shown before each message from MixGuess in chat. Any Unicode character supported in chat can be pasted here
How frequently the chat bot will post a MixGuess reminder in chat when “Occasionally Explain” is on
The first part of the MixGuess reminder message
The second part of the MixGuess reminder message
Move the position of the UI element in YOUR view
Move to the position of the UI element in EVERYONE'S view
Test the button without using any sparks. Testing the button will trigger all commands as if the real button was pressed.
The round can not be ended until all open offers are resolved
End the current round and announce a winner
Pick the type of button from a list
